subject: Horse Racing
Animal Abuse, Rights and Welfare
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Sporting Goods and Equipment
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: Riding crops used by jockeys to spur racehorses have been the center of much discussion over many years, one that still continues despite restrictions.
snippet: Riding crops used by jockeys to spur racehorses have been the center of much discussion over many years, one that still continues despite restrictions.
